vendorRequest.goodsTooltip: Examples of goods that fall under this exclusion are office supplies, office furniture, products purchased for internal use, and on-site catering
vendorRequest.internalTooltip: Goods for RESALE of any amount, must be processed through CARS.  For example, goods that will be bundled or packaged with Epson products or services for resale (e.g., packaging materials, cables, batteries, accessories, screens, and paper) MUST be processed through CARS

vendorRequest.isShortTerm: Short term (i.e., less than 1 year duration) equipment rental for warehouse use that is managed by the Supply Chain department.
vendorRequest.isProfessionalOrTradeOrSubscriptions: Professional or trade membership dues or subscriptions with an aggregate cost of less than $50,000.
vendorRequest.isRepairAndMaintenanceServiceManaged: Repairs and maintenance services managed by the Facilities team with a service period of less than a year, the vendor did not provide a contract, and the vendor’s evidence of insurance includes coverage within the limits that have been approved by the Epson Risk Department.

main.contractType: What category of request is this?
main.contractTypeNote: Select whether you are requesting a Vendor or Customer contract request.
main.vendorContractType: What Type of Contract would you like to create?
main.vendorContractTypeNote: Select whether you are requesting a vendor Master Agreement, SOW, Amendment or Change Order.
main.storageContractType: What Type of Contract are you archiving?
main.contractTypeLabel: What Type of Contract would you like to create?
main.contractTypeInfo:
An 'Master Agreement' is a Master Agreement that establishes the terms and conditions that will govern all current and future activities and responsibilities between Epson and the vendor.

An 'SOW' is a Statement of Work that sets forth the specific business terms and project/services/deliverables to be performed by the vendor. Each SOW is attached to and governed by an Master Agreement.

An 'Amendment to the Master Agreement' and 'Change Order to SOW” are both written amendments to either an existing Master Agreement or SOW that amends/changes the terms of the Master Agreement or SOW, as applicable.
main.maNotes:
This contract type includes: 
- Master services agreement, 
- Professional services agreement, 
- Master purchase agreement, 
- Order Form with link to online terms and conditions or with attached terms and conditions, 
- Engagement letter, 
- Carrier Agreements. 
This contract type should also be selected for any new vendor.‘
main.contractCategoryNote: Select whether you are purchasing Goods, Services or both.
main.contractCategoryInfo: Goods are typically tangible items such as equipment. Services are typically tasks or work performed by a vendor. Sometimes, a vendor may provide both goods and services, such as when you procure equipment and also obtain related services. For example, cafe dining services, construction/installation agreements or ‘purchasing computer/hardware and related services/software are all goods and services provided by the vendor.

purchasingOption.PRODUCT: If you are purchasing Goods, do they include any of the following?
purchasingOption.SERVICE: If you are purchasing Services, do they include any of the following?

nda.DISCLOSE: I will be disclosing confidential information but I do not have a contract in place
nda.NOT_DISCLOSE: I will NOT be disclosing confidential information
nda.RECEIVE_CONFIDENTIAL: I will NOT be disclosing confidential information but I will be receiving confidential information
nda.EXTERNAL_NDA: I have an existing NDA from an external source
nda.ndaNeeded: It looks like you need an NDA, please continue to submit your NDA request.
nda.ndaNotNeeded: It looks like you don’t need an NDA.
nda.ndaNotNeededInScope: It looks like you don’t need an NDA. Please confirm this with EAI Legal (CARS@ea.epson.com).
nda.informationPlaceholder: Please provide details about the information
nda.noConfidentialInfoNote: Please contact EAI Legal (CARS@ea.epson.com) with the details of your request.
nda.externalNdaNote: Please upload a copy of the signed NDA Contract. Make sure to select the "Signed NDA" document typ
nda.externalNdaError: Please upload the Signed NDA Document with "Signed NDA" type
nda.guidelines: Please read the NDA Guidelines here before submitting your request.
nda.ndaGuidelinesText:
1) Submit your NDA request EAI Legal will prepare the NDA within five (5) business days.

2) For vendor relationships, Epson’s NDA template must be used. For customer relationships, Epson is willing to consider the customer’s NDA template, but where possible encourage the use of Epson’s template. You must upload the counterparty’s template at the bottom of this request form, if applicable.

3) When the NDA draft is ready, EAI Legal will send the NDA to the other party for review, copying you. Epson and the other party may need to negotiate the NDA. Legal will upload the final NDA to CARS.

4) EAI Legal will send the NDA for signature via DocuSign.

5) In cases where the counterparty is using their own NDA template and DocuSign account, please insist that they copy {{name}} or EAI Legal on the DocuSign or otherwise make sure that EAI Legal receives a fully-executed copy. This is essential to get the signed NDA stored in CARS.

*Please Note: Confidential Information cannot be exchanged until ALL parties have signed the NDA. If additional information is required, EAI Legal will reach out to you.
nda.contractPurpose: What is the purpose of the NDA?
nda.contractPurposeNote: Please explain why you are disclosing or exchanging confidential information with the other party. For example, the purpose of the NDA is to share confidential information with a potential customer for a new business opportunity.
nda.sharedConfidentialInfo: What kind of confidential information will be shared?
nda.sharedConfidentialInfoNote: Please be specific. For example, if Epson is sharing confidential information, please specify the type of materials or information will be shared. Similarly, if the other party is sharing confidential information, please specify the type of materials or information that Epson will receive.
nda.existingNdaCoversScope: Is there an existing NDA with a purpose that already covers the scope of your request?
nda.additionalDetails: Are there additional details you would like to share?
nda.additionalDetailsNote: For example, if this is a 3 party NDA, please provide additional party details or if this is part of a batch NDA request (one of many NDAs with the same form and purpose), please let us know.

contract.title: Contract Information
contract.limitedVisibility: Do you wish to request limited access for this contract?
contract.limitedVisibilityNote: Select whether you want to limit visibility and access to the contract  because the contract contains sensitive and/or confidential information.
contract.limitedVisibilityPlaceholder: Please explain in details why you need limited visibility
contract.limitedVisibilityDetails: Does this workflow have limited visibility in place?
contract.purchaseCategoryNote: Select the primary category of products/services for this contract.
contract.purposeNote: Provide a detailed description of the contract and include key contract information.
contract.purposeInfo:
Explain why you are entering into a contract with the vendor, including information regarding the goods/services/products/deliverables the vendor will be providing, and include important milestones/dates/requirements related to the contract.

Also include all possible issues that could arise throughout the business relationship, that actions/responsibilities both parties will take together and individual actions/responsibilities assigned to each party.

Remember - this more detail you provide, the better!
contract.carrierContractRequirements: Is this a Carrier contract managed by the Supply Chain team that meets the following requirements
contract.isManagedTypes: Is this a staffing resource SOW managed by the IS team that meets the following requirements
contract.licenceRequirements: Is this a RENEWAL of an EXISTING software license/subscription procured by the IS department meeting all of the following requirements
contract.totalValueNote: Enter the total value of the contract over the life of the contract.
contract.totalValueInfo: The total contract value is the estimated lifetime value of a contract, including recurring costs and fees. For example, if the contract term is for 3 years, provide the total contract value over 3 years.
contract.contractPaymentTerms: Does the contract contain any of these terms
contract.net30: Payment terms are Net 30 or greater
contract.net30Note: Net 30 definition: Invoice payment is due 30 days from the invoice date
contract.downPayment: Down payment of more than 50% is required
contract.includeEpsonProduct: Part of the payment includes Epson goods/services
contract.shouldHoldInventory: Are you purchasing goods or services that will be re-sold or require that we hold inventory?
contract.agreementExtending: Is your contract request a rental/lease agreement extending beyond 1 year?
contract.areThereLegalTerms: Are there legal terms in the SOW (i.e. licensing, IP or indemnification)?
contract.forSaleResale: Is what we’re buying going to be for sale or resale?
contract.inventoryHoldRequired: Are we buying a product or service that requires we hold inventory?

contract.otherCompanies: Are there other Epson Companies included in this contract?
contract.otherCompaniesNote: If applicable, select the Epson company that will also be a party to the contract.
contract.itReviewQuestion1: Does this agreement include the license/lease/purchase/subscription of hardware or software (e.g., on-premise, cloud, mobile, or server)?
contract.isManagerReviewers: Please select at least one IS Manager reviewer
contract.itReviewQuestion2: Will the Vendor have access to, use, or process any (i) Epson Employees’ personally identifiable information (PII); (ii) Epson Customers’ PII; and/or (iii) Epson Non-Public/Confidential Information?
contract.itReviewQuestion2Info: Personally identifiable information means information that identifies, relates to, describes, is reasonably capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with an individual, including but not limited to email address, SSN, biometric information, commercial information (products/services purchased), internet activity, geolocation data and professional/employment information.

contract.dpaProvided: Did the Vendor provide a DPA?
contract.dpaProvidedInfo: Data Processing Addendum (DPA) or Data Protection Addendum, or Data Processing Terms (DPT). A DPA is required if a Vendor will receive and process PII from Epson, including Epson customers' PII.
contract.dpaProvidedNoteYes: Please upload the DPA document in the Supporting Documents section
contract.dpaProvidedNoteNo: It looks like you need an Epson DPA, please contact the Legal Team for assistance

details.title: Contract Details
details.evergreenInfo:
What is an EVERGREEN contract?

An evergreen contract is a non-expiring agreement between 2 parties.
details.workStartedBeforeSubmitted: Was worked started and/or completed before the contract was submitted?
details.autoRenewalOption: Does the contract have a renewal option?
details.autoRenewalNote: Note: For your convenience, you will receive a reminder email 180 days before the required Expiration date.
details.autoRenewalNoteLink: Click here to change the reminder email date
details.autoRenewalError: PLEASE NOTE: Expiration Reminder email could not be sent as the selected Expiration/Auto-renew date has already passed

details.expirationReminderNote: Note: If you wish to provide a notice of non-renewal, please contact the lawyer for this contract to process your request. For your convenience, you will receive a reminder email 120 days before the required Notice of Non-Renewal date.
details.expirationReminderNoteLease: Note: If you wish to provide a notice of renewal, please contact the lawyer for this contract to process your request. For your convenience, you will receive a reminder email 180 days before the required Notice of Renewal date.
details.expirationReminderToggle: Click here to change the reminder email date.
details.expirationReminderSent: Expiration Reminder email to be sent
details.expirationReminderSentDays: day(s) before the required Notice of Renewal date
details.workStartedBeforeSigned: Was work started and/or completed before the contract was signed?
details.contractNameInfo:
- Length should not be beyond 250 characters

- Allowed special characters within the name:

  • Exclamation point (!)
  • Hyphen (-)
  • Underscore (_)
  • Period (.)
  • Asterisk (*)
  • Single quote (')
  • Open parenthesis (()
  • Close parenthesis ())
  • Ampersand (&)
  • Plus (+)
  • Comma (,)
  • 'At' symbol (@)
